titleStmt.title: Eadmeri monachi Cantuariensis Historiæ nouorum siue sui sæculi libri VI res gestas (quibus ipse non modò spectator diligens sed comes etiam & actor plerunq[ue] interfuit) sub Guilielmis I & II & Henrico I Angliæ Regibus, ab anno nempè salutis MLXVI ad MCXXII potissimùm complexi. In lucem ex bibliotheca Cottoniana emisit Ioannes Seldenus, & notas porrò adjecit & spicilegium.
Historiæ novorum
titleStmt.author: Eadmer, d. 1124?
Selden, John, 1584-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Typis & impensis Guilielmi Stanesbeij, ex officinis Richardi Meighen & Thomæ Dew,

notesStmt.note: Title page in red and black.
T3.4 are a cancel bifolium in apparently all copies (STC).
A variant (STC 7438.2) lacks Meighen and Dew's names in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
